DrLOUIE Revitalizing All-in-One Essence, Oil-Free

Brand: DrLouie

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, FOMES OFFICINALIS (TRUNK ROT) EXTRACT, PANTHENOL, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, PHYLLANTHUS EMBLICA (INDIAN GOOSEBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ALLANTOIN, ARGININE, HYALURONIC ACID, ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE

War

ERA) LEAF JUICE

Warnings: :
Patch test first. Stop using if irritation occurs. For external use only. Keep reach out of children.
